game.name: Candy Pig
game.description:
Today you are going to meet with a pig that is a bit careless, but loves eating the devil fruits! In an accident, he lost his feet but can stretch his arm to get his desired things. Do not bother he can stretch his arm to reach to a sufficient length. Does it sound interesting to help a needy pig? Join Candy Pig and gear up to help him to gather his favorite items that are sweet candies! It sounds easy to handle, but many hurdles and complexities are there in advanced levels. 

The cute pig will be happy to see your raising hand for him. Do not forget grab all the golden stars to finish the game with 3 stars. Make sure that he can reach the candy box at the end in this html5 puzzle game. Keep your mind open and deal with all the obstacles on your way with a full confidence. Try not to get your character tangled up in the puzzles until you clear all 9 levels! Tons of fun challenge, colorful graphics and easy and simple gameplay will surely help you to keep engrossed for hours!

Move your character by clicking or tapping the point of wall in this brain games for kids! It is up to you how to help the pig get to board with candy. Finish all unique and challenging 9 levels and do not forget to share your achievements on different popular social media websites! You can find many more popular titles from the category of animal physics games that are free to play online on atmegame.com without download.
